about.pageSubtitle: Quoc Khanh Uniform Vietnam Company Limited - Professional high-quality uniform specialist

intro.title: About Quoc Khanh Uniform Vietnam Company Limited
intro.desc: Quoc Khanh Uniform Vietnam Company Limited was established on May 10, 2019, with the goal of becoming a leading unit in the field of uniform manufacturing, design and processing in Vietnam. With over 5 years of experience in the apparel industry, we are proud to be a trusted partner of hundreds of businesses, schools and organizations nationwide.

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.missionDesc: We are committed to bringing high-quality uniform products that meet all requirements for aesthetics, functionality and durability. Each product created reflects the dedication, professionalism and responsibility of the Quoc Khanh Uniform team.
mission.visionDesc: To become Vietnam's leading uniform company, trusted and chosen by customers thanks to outstanding product quality, professional service and competitive prices.

activity.title: Business Areas
areas: Corporate uniform manufacturing: Shirts, vests, trousers, corporate jackets according to custom design
Student uniforms: Shirts, uniform pants/skirts, jackets, student shoes
Safety workwear: Safety shirts, safety pants, gloves, helmets
Restaurant - hotel uniforms: Waitstaff shirts, chef uniforms, receptionist uniforms, management uniforms
Design & Processing: Design consultation, sample manufacturing, mass production

machinery.title: Machinery & Technology
machinery.desc: We invest in modern industrial sewing machine systems, imported from developed countries such as Japan, Germany and South Korea:
items: Single needle sewing machines: 50 machines - Specializing in basic seams, edges, pockets
Overlock machines: 30 machines - Processing fabric edges, preventing seam fraying
Double needle machines: 25 machines - Making double seams, increasing durability
Buttonhole machines: 10 machines - Automatic buttonhole creation, high precision
Button attaching machines: 8 machines - Automatic button attachment, secure
Edge sewing machines: 15 machines - Professional edge and collar sewing
Industrial steam irons: 20 machines - Flattening fabric, improving product quality
Electronic fabric cutters: 5 machines - Precise fabric cutting, material saving

production.title: Factory Capacity
production.desc: With a total of 163 machines and 120 skilled workers, our production capacity:
items: Corporate uniform production: 3,000 - 5,000 sets/month
Student uniforms: 5,000 - 8,000 sets/month
Safety workwear: 4,000 - 6,000 sets/month
Restaurant - Hotel uniforms: 2,000 - 4,000 sets/month
Total capacity: 14,000 - 23,000 products/month

materials.title: Materials & Quality
materials.desc: We use premium fabrics, imported and domestically produced:
items: Cotton fabric: 100% cotton, cotton blend, stretch
Polyester fabric: Wrinkle-resistant, easy to maintain
Khaki fabric: Durable, strong, suitable for corporate uniforms
Safety fabric: Fire-resistant, waterproof, breathable
Accessories: Strong thread, durable buttons, quality zippers

team.title: Human Resources
team.desc: Quoc Khanh Uniform is proud to have a professional and experienced team:
items: 120 sewing workers: Well-trained, with 3-15 years of experience
15 cutters: High technique, precise cutting, fabric saving
10 QC staff: Strict quality control at each stage
8 design staff: Creative, capturing fashion trends
5 sewing engineers: Technical management, ensuring production quality

certificates.title: Certifications & Awards
items: Business registration certificate: Tax ID 0108735264
ISO 9001:2015 certification for quality management system
Occupational safety certification
Award "Typical Apparel Industry Enterprise in Hanoi" 2022

corporate.title: üëî Corporate Uniforms
corporate.desc: Professional corporate uniform design and manufacturing, impressively representing your company brand. We specialize in producing high-quality office uniforms with beautiful designs and reasonable prices.

products.title: Corporate Shirts
products.desc: Long-sleeve and short-sleeve shirts in standard form, can print/embroider company logo. Premium cotton material, breathable, easy to wash and iron.

products.title: Corporate Vests
products.desc: Men/women vests tailored to form, premium fabric, beautiful shape. Can include matching vest pants.

products.title: Trousers
products.desc: Beautiful form men/women trousers, khaki or industrial fabric material, colorfast, wrinkle-resistant.

products.title: Corporate Jackets
products.desc: Winter jackets, light summer jackets. Can print logo, embroider text on jacket.

features: Custom design according to requirements, representing corporate culture
Premium fabric material, colorfast, breathable
Accurate measurements according to each employee size
High-quality print/embroider logo, company name
On-time delivery, no hidden costs
process: Consultation and sample design according to requirements
Measure and record information for each employee

student.title: üéì Student Uniforms
student.desc: Durable, beautiful, breathable student uniforms, meeting Vietnamese education standards. We produce uniforms for kindergartens, primary, middle, and high schools with beautiful designs and high quality.

products.title: Student Shirts
products.desc: White shirts according to Ministry of Education standards. Spacious form, breathable, suitable for students. Can print/embroider school logo.

products.title: Uniform Pants/Skirts
products.desc: Navy blue pants for boys, pleated skirts for girls. Khaki or industrial fabric material, durable, easy to wash.

products.title: Student Jackets
products.desc: Winter jackets, can print school logo, class name. Light waterproof material.

products.title: Accessories
products.desc: Ties, scarves, uniform caps. Can print logo, embroider school text.

features: Design suitable for student age groups
Safe fabric material, non-allergenic
Spacious form, comfortable for activities
Colorfast, easy to wash and iron, reasonable prices
Diverse sizes from kindergarten to high school
quality: Meet Ministry of Education quality standards
Fabric does not fade, does not shrink
Quality inspection for each product before delivery

safety.title: ü¶∫ Safety Workwear
safety.desc: Safety workwear meeting safety standards, high quality for workers. We specialize in producing various types of protective clothing for different industries.

products.title: Safety Shirts
products.desc: Fire-resistant, waterproof, reflective safety shirts. Suitable for construction, manufacturing, transportation workers.

products.title: Safety Pants
products.desc: Durable safety pants with wide pockets, drawstring. Khaki or premium canvas fabric material.

products.title: Reflective Shirts
products.desc: Reflective shirts for traffic, construction workers. High-quality 3M reflective strips.

products.title: Specialized Protective Wear
products.desc: Chemical-resistant, UV-resistant, anti-static clothing. According to each industry requirements.

features: Meet Vietnamese and international occupational safety standards
Specialized material, durable, fire/water resistant
Convenient design, multiple pockets, easy movement
Clear reflective strips, ensuring safety
Diverse sizes, suitable for all body types

hotel.title: üçΩÔ∏è Restaurant - Hotel Uniforms
hotel.desc: Elegant restaurant and hotel uniform design, creating a good impression with customers. We specialize in making uniforms for receptionists, waitstaff, chefs, management with high quality.

products.title: Receptionist Uniforms
products.desc: Elegant shirts/vests, beautiful pants/skirts. Refined design, showing professionalism.

products.title: Waitstaff Uniforms
products.desc: Shirts, trousers/skirts, waitstaff aprons. Harmonious colors, easy movement, easy to wash.

products.title: Chef Uniforms
products.desc: Premium chef shirts, chef hats, aprons. Stain-resistant, oil-resistant, easy to wash.

products.title: Management Uniforms
products.desc: Vests, premium shirts for management. Distinctive design, more elegant than staff.

features: Elegant design, suitable for restaurant/hotel spaces
Premium fabric material, colorfast, wrinkle-resistant
Easy to wash and iron, quick dry, suitable for frequent use
Can embroider/print restaurant, hotel logo
Diverse designs, suitable for each job position
services: Consultation on uniform design according to restaurant/hotel style
Sample making for customers to view and edit

policies.pageSubtitle: Commitment to the best quality and service for customers

privacy.title: Privacy Policy for Website and Mobile Application

website.title: I. Privacy Policy for Website
items: The website does not collect any personal information from users.
The website only provides information about QUOC KHANH UNIFORM VIET NAM COMPANY LIMITED.
The website does not use cookies, tracking codes, or any other tracking technology.

mobile.title: II. Privacy Policy for Mobile Application
items: The mobile application is only intended to introduce QUOC KHANH UNIFORM VIET NAM COMPANY LIMITED and the company's apparel products/services.
The application does not collect any personal data from users.
The application does not require users to create an account or log in.
The application does not track user behavior, activities, or location.
The application does not use any analytics, statistics, or analytics systems.

warranty.title: üõ°Ô∏è Warranty Policy
warranty.timeDesc: Quoc Khanh Uniform Vietnam Company Limited commits to warranty product quality for customers with the following periods:

timeItems.corporate: Corporate uniforms: 6 months from delivery date
timeItems.student: Student uniforms: 6 months from delivery date
timeItems.safety: Safety workwear: 3 months from delivery date
timeItems.hotel: Restaurant - hotel uniforms: 6 months from delivery date

warranty.scopeDesc: Products are warranted free of charge in the following cases:
scopeItems: Manufacturing defects: Seam unraveling, buttons falling off, broken zippers, print/embroidery logo errors
Material defects: Fabric fading quickly, excessive shrinkage (over 5%), tearing due to poor material
Size errors: Size does not match measured information (if due to our error)
Finishing defects: Products with stains, oil stains from production process
warranty.notCoveredDesc: The following cases are not covered by warranty:
notCoveredItems: Products torn or damaged due to improper use
Stains caused by users during use
Damage due to improper washing/ironing (too high temperature, strong bleach)
Damage due to accidents, natural disasters, fires
Damage due to repairs by third parties
Products that have exceeded warranty period
Damage due to natural wear after long use

processItems.desc: Customer contacts us by phone or email to report product defects
We will inspect and confirm whether the defect is within warranty scope
Repair: If repairable, we will repair free of charge within 3-5 days. Replacement: If not repairable or serious defect, we will replace with new product

notes: Customers need to keep invoice/delivery slip for warranty procedures
Warranty products must be intact, not torn, not missing accessories
Warranty period is calculated from delivery date according to delivery slip

delivery.title: üöö Delivery Policy
delivery.timeDesc: Delivery time depends on quantity and product type:
delivery.timeNote: Note: The above time is calculated after the customer has approved the sample and paid the deposit (30-50% of contract value).
methodItems: Home delivery: Free delivery within Hanoi city center
Provincial delivery: Customer pays shipping according to shipping unit (Viettel Post, J&T, Vietnam Post...)
Pick up at factory: Customer can come directly to factory to pick up, no fee

processItems.desc: We will notify 1-2 days in advance when products are ready for delivery
Confirm delivery address and time with customer
Delivery according to agreed address and time
Customer checks quantity, quality and signs acceptance

commitmentItems: Deliver correct quantity according to contract
Careful packaging, ensuring products are not damaged during transportation
Each product is packaged separately, with label showing size, recipient name (if any)
delivery.lateDesc: If we deliver late compared to committed time (except for force majeure):
lateItems: We will notify and apologize to customer
Reduce 5-10% of order value (depending on delay level)

return.title: üîÑ Return & Exchange Policy
return.conditionsDesc: Customers have the right to return products in the following cases:
conditionsItems: Wrong size: Size does not match order information (if due to our error)
Wrong model: Product does not match approved sample
Wrong color: Color does not match requirements
Manufacturing defect: Product has defect from manufacturer (within warranty scope)
Wrong quantity: Missing or excess quantity compared to order

timeItems.size: Size exchange: Within 7 days from receipt date
timeItems.color: Color/model exchange: Within 3 days from receipt date
timeItems.defect: Exchange due to defect: Within warranty period (see warranty policy)

return.productConditionsDesc: Return products must meet the following conditions:

processItems.desc: Customer contacts us by phone or email to notify return request
We confirm return reason and check conditions
Customer sends product back to our address. We pay shipping if due to our error. Customer pays shipping if due to size/color exchange request (within first 7 days)
We check and process return within 3-5 days

notes: Each product can only be returned once (except for manufacturer defects)
If customer requests exchange to different model with higher price, must pay additional difference
If customer requests exchange to different model with lower price, we will refund the difference
Return due to our error will be processed completely free

policies.ctaDesc: Contact us for answers to your questions

process.pageSubtitle: From design to delivery - Ensuring quality and schedule

overview.title: Process Overview
overview.desc: Quoc Khanh Uniform follows a professional uniform production process, ensuring product quality and delivery schedule. Our process consists of 7 main steps, from receiving requirements to delivery and post-sale warranty.

step1.title: Receive Requirements & Consultation
step1.desc: Customers contact us via phone, email or directly at the office. Our consulting team will listen to customer needs and requirements:
customerNeeds: Type of uniform needed (corporate, student, safety, restaurant...)
step1.consultTitle: We will provide detailed consultation on:

step2.title: Quote & Contract Signing
step2.desc: After discussing with the customer, we will prepare a detailed quote and send it to the customer within 24 hours. The quote includes:
step2.contractTitle: When the customer agrees to the quote, we will sign a production contract with clear terms on:

step3.title: Design & Sample Making
step3.desc: Our design team will design uniform samples based on customer requirements:

processItems.label: Computer design
processItems.desc: Create 2D, 3D design files for customer preview

processItems.label: Design approval
processItems.desc: Customer reviews and edits until satisfied

processItems.label: Sample making
processItems.desc: Produce 1-3 sample sets for customer to see in person

step3.afterApproval: After customer approves the sample, we will proceed with measurements and collect information for each employee/student.

step4.title: Material Preparation & Fabric Cutting
step4.desc: Once the sample is approved, we proceed with material preparation:

items.label: Fabric procurement
items.desc: Purchase fabric according to agreed material

items.label: Fabric inspection
items.desc: Check quality, color, thickness

items.label: Accessory preparation
items.desc: Thread, buttons, zippers, logos...

items.label: Fabric cutting
items.desc: Use electronic cutting machines to cut fabric accurately according to patterns

items.label: Cutting inspection
items.desc: Ensure quantity and quality of each part

step5.title: Mass Production
step5.time: Depending on quantity (10-20 days for 1000-5000 products)
step5.desc: The production process is divided into stages:

stages.label: Stage 2 - Overlocking
stages.desc: Process fabric edges, prevent seam unraveling

step5.qcNote: During production, the QC team will check quality at each stage to ensure standards.

step6.title: Quality Inspection & Finishing
step6.desc: Before delivery, we perform quality inspection on all products:

items.label: Product inspection
items.desc: Fit, seams, fabric quality

items.label: Logo inspection
items.desc: Ensure print/embroidery is correct, beautiful, no errors

items.label: Size inspection
items.desc: Ensure correct size for each person

items.label: Finishing inspection
items.desc: Buttons, zippers, drawstrings work properly

items.label: Pressing and packaging
items.desc: Press products flat, package carefully

items.label: Labeling
items.desc: Attach size labels, recipient names for each product

step6.note: Products that do not meet quality standards will be repaired or remanufactured.

step7.title: Delivery & Acceptance
step7.desc: We deliver on the committed schedule:

deliveryItems.label: Home delivery
deliveryItems.desc: Free delivery within Hanoi city center

deliveryItems.label: Provincial delivery
deliveryItems.desc: Delivery to customer address, shipping fee as agreed

supportItems: Listen to feedback to improve quality

items.title: Quality Assurance
items.desc: Quality inspection at each stage, ensuring products meet standards

items.title: On-Time Delivery
items.desc: Commit to deliver on the agreed time in the contract

items.title: Product Warranty
items.desc: Quality warranty, free repair if there are manufacturer defects

items.title: Dedicated Support
items.desc: Consulting and support team ready to answer all questions

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.desc: With over 5 years of experience in uniform manufacturing, Quoc Khanh Uniform has successfully completed over 500 large and small projects for businesses, schools, and organizations across the country. We are proud to accompany hundreds of trusted clients.

items.title: Financial Company Uniforms
items.desc: Modern office uniform design for financial company with premium shirts and vests. Company logo elegantly embroidered on shirts.

items.title: THCS Phuc Loi School Uniforms
items.desc: Student uniform production for all students of THCS Phuc Loi School. White shirts and navy blue pants/skirts according to Ministry of Education standards.

items.title: Construction Company Safety Workwear
items.desc: Fire-resistant safety workwear with reflective strips for construction workers. Meets occupational safety standards.

items.title: Elite Restaurant Uniforms
items.desc: Elegant uniform design and manufacturing for upscale restaurant. Includes receptionist, waitstaff and chef uniforms.

items.title: Technology Company Uniforms
items.desc: Youthful, modern corporate uniforms for technology company. Polo shirts and light jackets with company logo printing.

items.title: Hoa Sen Primary School Uniforms
items.desc: Primary school student uniforms with cute design, bright colors. Soft cotton fabric material, safe for children.

items.author: Ms. Nguyen Thi Lan - Director of Financial Company
items.text: Quoc Khanh Uniform created an excellent uniform set for our company. Product quality exceeded expectations, delivery was on time and pricing was reasonable. We will continue to cooperate in the future.

items.author: Mr. Tran Van Binh - Principal of THCS Phuc Loi
items.text: Quoc Khanh Uniform student uniforms are very beautiful and durable. Parents and students are all satisfied. Professional consulting service, dedicated support.

items.author: Mr. Le Van Cuong - Director of Construction Company
items.text: Quoc Khanh Uniform safety workwear meets safety standards, good quality. Workers feel comfortable when working. Very satisfied with the service.

items.author: Ms. Pham Thi Dung - Manager of Elite Restaurant
items.text: Quoc Khanh Uniform restaurant uniforms are very elegant and professional. Beautiful design, good material. Customers highly appreciate the staff image.

articles.title: QK Uniform App Launched on Google Play Store
articles.desc: Quoc Khanh Uniform proudly launches the official mobile application on Google Play Store. The app helps customers easily learn about the company, services, news and contact us anytime, anywhere...

articles.title: QK Uniform App - Learn About Company Information Anytime, Anywhere
articles.desc: With the QK Uniform app, customers can view company information, uniform manufacturing services, and latest news right on their phone. Friendly interface, easy to use, free download on Google Play...

articles.title: Outstanding Features of QK Uniform App: Introduction, Contact & News
articles.desc: The QK Uniform app provides complete information about the company, uniform manufacturing services, direct contact form and latest news. Users can view information directly on the app conveniently...

articles.title: Corporate Uniform Trends 2024: Fashionable & Professional
articles.desc: Corporate uniforms are not just work clothes but also a symbol of corporate culture. In 2024, corporate uniform trends focus on combining fashion and professionalism...

articles.title: Guide to Choosing Suitable Fabric Material for Uniforms
articles.desc: Choosing the right fabric material is very important when making uniforms. This article will help you understand common fabrics such as cotton, polyester, khaki and how to choose the right fabric for each type of uniform...

articles.title: Student Uniform Standards According to Ministry of Education
articles.desc: The Ministry of Education and Training has issued regulations on student uniforms. Schools need to comply with standards on color, style, and material to ensure consistency and safety...

articles.title: Safety Workwear: Safety Standards and Quality
articles.desc: Safety workwear plays an important role in ensuring worker safety. The article explains TCVN, ISO safety standards and how to choose suitable safety workwear...

articles.title: How to Preserve Uniforms to Maintain Color and Durability
articles.desc: Proper uniform preservation helps extend lifespan and maintain color and fit. We share tips on washing, ironing and preserving uniforms by fabric type...

articles.title: Logo Design on Uniforms: Print or Embroider?
articles.desc: Logos on uniforms can be printed or embroidered. Each method has its own advantages and disadvantages. The article compares in detail between printing and embroidering logos to help you choose the most suitable method...

articles.title: Uniform Fashion Trends 2024: From Traditional to Modern
articles.desc: The garment industry is witnessing changes in uniform design trends. In 2024, uniform designs combine traditional and modern elements, creating a unique style...

articles.title: Guide to Accurate Uniform Size Measurement
articles.desc: Accurate uniform size measurement is an important step to get a well-fitting product. We provide detailed instructions on how to measure necessary measurements such as chest, waist, shirt length, pants...

articles.title: Modern Sewing Technology: From Manual to Automation
articles.desc: The garment industry is transitioning to automation and digital technology. Modern industrial sewing machines, 3D design software, fabric cutting robots... are changing how uniforms are produced...
